companies.name: Walmart
companies.description: Walmart is an American multinational retail corporation that operates a chain of hypermarkets, discount department stores, and grocery stores,[8] headquartered in Bentonville, Arkansas.

companies.name: Target Corporation
companies.description: Target Corporation is the eighth-largest retailer in the United States, and is a component of the S&P 500 Index.

companies.name: Kroger
companies.description: Kroger is an American retailing company founded by Bernard Kroger in 1883 in Cincinnati, Ohio. It is the United States' largest supermarket chain by revenue ($115.34 billion for fiscal year 2016),[4] the second-largest general retailer (behind Walmart)[4] and the seventeenth largest company in the United States.
